title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: As Papaji’s trial date gets closer, Ghosh scrambles to gather new evidence while Rinku goes on a rampage, determined to destroy his enemies. However, Ghosh discovers a chink in Rinku’s armour and makes a startling discovery that threatens to blow the case wide open.
